function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Emphasis on smart sensors and devices leads to privacy concerns","Impact":"Invasion of privacy and data security breaches","Mitigation":"Developing strict privacy policies and implementing secure data encryption","Technologies":"Data encryption and privacy protection software","People":"City residents and citizens","Owner":"City governments and regulatory authorities"},{"Description":"Dependence on advanced technologies introduces vulnerability to cyber attacks","Impact":"Data breaches, disruption of services, and compromised safety measures","Mitigation":"Regular security assessments, software updates, and employee training on cyber security best practices","Technologies":"Cyber security software, regular software updates, and employee training programs","People":"City IT departments and technology suppliers","Owner":"City governments and technology service providers"},{"Description":"Unequal access to smart city technologies exacerbates urban safety disparities","Impact":"Increased safety disparities between different city areas and demographics","Mitigation":"Equitable distribution of smart city technologies and resources across all city areas and demographics","Technologies":"Smart city infrastructure and resource distribution systems","People":"Underprivileged communities and marginalized groups","Owner":"City governments and technology service providers"}]}
